fields.name: BlobName
fields.description: The name of the blob input.

fields.name: Container
fields.description: The name of a container within the associated Storage account. This container contains either the blob(s) to be read from or written to. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.

fields.name: DateFormat
fields.description: The date format. Wherever {date} appears in pathPattern, the value of this property is used as the date format instead.

fields.name: DeltaPathPattern
fields.description: The path pattern of the delta snapshot.

fields.name: DeltaSnapshotRefreshRate
fields.description: The interval that the user generates a delta snapshot of this reference blob input data source.

fields.name: FullSnapshotRefreshRate
fields.description: The refresh interval of the blob input data source.

fields.name: PathPattern
fields.description: The blob path pattern. Not a regular expression. It represents a pattern against which blob names will be matched to determine whether or not they should be included as input or output to the job. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/streamanalytics/stream-analytics-input or https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/streamanalytics/stream-analytics-output for a more detailed explanation and example.

fields.name: SourcePartitionCount
fields.description: The partition count of the blob input data source. Range 1 - 256.

fields.name: StorageAccounts
fields.description: A list of one or more Azure Storage accounts. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.

fields.name: TimeFormat
fields.description: The time format. Wherever {time} appears in pathPattern, the value of this property is used as the time format instead.
